source: They are hunting dogs.
result: 他们是猎犬。

source: They are hunting dogs. Their master feeds them every day.
result: 他们是猎狗 他们的主人每天喂它们

source: They are hunting dogs. But they can not find any.
result: 他们是猎犬,但找不到

source: She can't bear children.
result: 她不能生孩子

source: She can't bear children. They are too noisy.
result: 她不能生孩子 他们太吵了

source: She can't bear children. So she has to adopt a child.
result: 她不能生孩子 所以她必须收养孩子

source: Mr.Smith loves music more than his wife.
result: 史密斯先生比他的妻子更喜欢音乐

source: Mr.Smith loves music more than his wife, who is a big fan of jazz.
result: Smith先生比他的妻子更喜欢音乐,妻子是爵士乐的忠实粉丝。

source: Mr.Smith loves music more than his wife, which makes his wife angry.
result: Smith先生比他的妻子更喜欢音乐,这让他妻子很生气。

source: He saw a girl with a telescope.
result: 他看见一个女孩拿着望远镜

source: He saw a girl with a telescope, which he bought yesterday.
result: 他看见一个女孩拿着望远镜 他昨天买的

source: He saw a girl with a telescope, which she bought yesterday.
result: 他看见一个女孩拿着望远镜 她昨天买的

source: We found her a good teacher.
result: 我们给她找了个好老师

source: We found her a good teacher. She was happy to attend to class.
result: 我们给她找了个好老师 她很高兴能去上课

source: We found her a good teacher. So we decided to raise her salary.
result: 我们给她找了个好老师 所以我们决定提高她的工资

source: He must be married.
result: 他必须结婚。

source: He must be married, otherwise he can not inherit the mansion.
result: 他必须结婚,否则他不能继承官邸。

source: He must be married. I saw a girl call him dad today.
result: 他一定结婚了 今天我看见一个女孩叫他爸爸

source: Mary is too kind a girl to refuse.
result: 玛丽是个拒绝的女孩

source: Mary is too kind a girl to refuse. So I decided to drive her home.
result: 玛丽是个拒绝的女孩 所以我决定开车送她回家

source: Mary is too kind a girl to refuse. So she always helps the people in need.
result: 所以她总是帮助有需要的人

source: Tom was not reading all the time.
result: 汤姆没有一直看书

source: Tom was not reading all the time. In fact, he was playing video games.
result: 汤姆不常看书 事实上,他玩电子游戏

source: Tom was not reading all the time. He read several pages before he played video games.
result: 汤姆不常看书,他在玩电子游戏前看过几页

source: We noticed her back.
result: 我们注意到她回来了

source: She ran so fast. We noticed her back.
result: 她跑得那么快 我们注意到她回来了

source: We noticed her back. She was scared at that time.
result: 我们注意到她回来了 她当时很害怕
